about_the_game:
Introducing "Guess What!"
Greetings, aspiring sound engineers!

We are thrilled to announce the launch of our cutting-edge application, "Guess What!" now available on Steam!

Why This App?

Developing the skills to excel in critical listening is a challenging journey, but with our app, you have the perfect companion to guide you through this process. Our application is designed to be the most advanced and convenient tool among existing Audio Frequency Test Apps, making your path to becoming a great sound engineer smoother and more efficient.

Key Features:

• Sine Waveform Tests: Hone your ability to identify and distinguish between different sine waves, a fundamental skill for any sound engineer.
• Pink Noise Tests: Practice with pink noise to improve your understanding of frequency balance and sound quality assessment.
• Audio Sample Tests: Train your ears to pick out nuances and details in audiuo samples, crucial for mixing and mastering.
• Custom Music File Tests: Upload and test with your own music files, allowing for a personalized and immersive learning experience.

Whether you are a beginner looking to develop your critical listening skills or a seasoned professional aiming to sharpen your expertise, our app is the ultimate tool to help you achieve your goals.

Join Us on Steam!

Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your sound engineering skills to the next level. Download "Guess What!" on Steam today and embark on your journey towards mastering the art of critical listening.

Thank you for your support, and we look forward to helping you become the best sound engineer you can be!

Download Now and Start Your Journey!

name: Guess What!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: 64-bit Intel® or AMD multi-core processor. Intel® Core™ i5 processor or faster recommended
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with native Windows 10 support
  • Storage: 129 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OS compatible audio hardware
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Introducing "Guess What!" on Steam! This advanced app features sine wave, pink noise, and audio sample frequency tests, plus custom music file frequency testing. Perfect for all skill levels to enhance critical listening and sound engineering skills. Download now!
